name: PowerLaser PL500 Classic
descr:
PowerLaser PL500 Classic quick, easy and effective in use. It combines raw power with an elegant, compact design. The Laser is independent of both a basic unit and a power source, thereby offering total freedom in any therapy situation. When turned on ready in just a few seconds.

Delivered with AC-Adapter, 90-250VAC, SmartCharger battery charger, extra battery, userÂ´s manual and specially designed carrying case.
